titles.title: A bill to extend the suspension of duty on certain diamond tool and drill blanks, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9982-9983)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/30/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1995, the suspension of duty on certain diamond tool and drill blanks.
